masa_gadget_mod.config.generic.openConfi: A hotkey to open the in-game Config GUI
masa_gadget_mod.config.litematica.saveIn: Use pcaSyncProtocol to sync inventory data to local and save to schematic
masa_gadget_mod.config.malilib.fixConfig: Use the length of getTranslatedGuiDisplayName as widget width
masa_gadget_mod.config.malilib.optimizeC: Make search support uppercase, translate text, and can use §6modified§r to search modified config
masa_gadget_mod.config.minihud.compactBb: Parse bbor protocol and send data to minihud
masa_gadget_mod.config.minihud.pcaSyncPr: Press §6inventoryPreview§r hotkey to use PCA sync protocol to sync Beehive
masa_gadget_mod.config.tweakeroo.invento: Player can use inventory preview on free camera
Player can use inventory preview to show the inventory of player and ender chest inventory

When player press the inventory preview hotkey, player can use the mouse wheel to select items (player can view the enchantment information), and when player select the shulker box in the chest, player can press the mouse scroll to preview the items in the box
masa_gadget_mod.config.tweakeroo.pcaSync: Use pcaSyncProtocol to sync block entity data and entity data from server, such as chest, villager
